body.name: SheaMoisture Curl & Shine Conditioner Coconut & Hibiscus, for Thick, Curly Hair to Moisturize & Soften, 13 oz
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 57 mins.
FREE pickup February 27 - March 3 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: SheaMoisture Coconut & Hibiscus Conditioner is a rinse-out conditioner that transforms dry, brittle hair to vibrant, bouncy waves and curls.
For those with wavy, curly and coily hair, instantly hydrate and define your curls for healthier feeling hair after just one use.
Provides hydration that enhances the elasticity of your hair to help define your gorgeous natural curl pattern without weighing it down system vs non-conditioning shampoo.
Blended with Neem Oil, the Curl & Shine Shampoo & Conditioner repair hair, add shine, and leave curls feeling healthy with a show-stopping shine.
Pump up the hydration and say goodbye to lifeless curls with the nutrient rich Curl & Shine Shampoo and Conditioner to bring the bounce back to your curls.

All SheaMoisture hair products, like this Coconut & Hibiscus Conditioner, are made with fair trade shea butter and contain no silicones, no sulfates, no parabens, no phthalates, no mineral oil and no petrolatum.
body.description: Give your hair a smooth and shiny finish by conditioning your hair with SheaMoisture’s Coconut & Hibiscus Curl and Shine Silicone-Free Conditioner for curly hair. This rinse out conditioner for thick hair transforms dry, brittle hair to vibrant, bouncy waves and curls. Instantly softens and detangles dry, frizzy hair while infusing your curls with intense moisture. This Curl & Shine Conditioner pumps up the hydration and leaves you with more moisturized curls after just one use. Also leave you with a show-stopping shine, irresistible softness, and beautifully defined natural curl pattern. Watch your hair shine! How to Use: After shampooing with SheaMoisture Shine & Curl Shampoo, apply the Coconut & Hibiscus Conditioner generously and use a comb to evenly distribute the conditioner for hair. Leave it in for 3 minutes, rinse, and style as desired. Curls are left vibrant, bouncy and healthy looking with a soft feel and brilliant shine. Our Story: SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker, a pioneering mother of four and an entrepreneur, who sold Shea Butter, African Black Soap and homemade beauty preparations in Sierra Leone in 1912.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner has a great coconut smell, it helps detangle and keeps permed curls soft and hydrated. I buy it for my teen son's permed curls to keep them looking fresh longer. I also buy the shampoo and spray and they keep the curls healthy looking for a long time. I mostly like that this brand is affordable and does the same job as the salon or expensive brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product, doesn’t make my hair too flat
reviews.reviewText: I like this product and would recommend for people who have curly or wavy hair. It didn’t make my hair as flat as other products, and it smells good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Hair Game-Changer with the Power of Coconut and Hibiscus!
reviews.reviewText: If I could give the SheaMoisture Coconut and Hibiscus Conditioner more than five stars, I absolutely would! This conditioner has transformed my haircare routine and exceeded my expectations in every way imaginable. From its deeply moisturizing formula to its heavenly scent and remarkable results, this product is a true gem.First and foremost, the moisturizing power of this conditioner is simply unmatched. With every use, my hair feels rejuvenated, nourished, and incredibly soft. The infusion of coconut and hibiscus works wonders, leaving my hair with a healthy shine that's hard to ignore. Say goodbye to dry, lackluster locks – this conditioner is like a drink of water for your hair.The scent of this conditioner is nothing short of amazing. The delicate blend of coconut and hibiscus creates a tropical aroma that's both refreshing and soothing. It's a wonderful sensory experience that lingers in your hair long after you've rinsed it out, making you feel like you're on a luxurious spa retreat every time you shower.And let's talk about the magic it works on curls! If you have curly hair, you know the struggle of finding a product that enhances and defines your curls without leaving them feeling weighed down or crunchy. Well, look no further. This conditioner brings out the natural beauty of curls, leaving them bouncy, soft, and oh-so-defined. It's like a curly hair dream come true.The versatility of this conditioner is another highlight. Whether you have fine or thick hair, straight or wavy, this product adapts seamlessly to provide the nourishment and care your hair craves. It's a true multitasker that caters to a wide range of hair types, making it a staple for anyone seeking luscious locks.In a world full of haircare products, the SheaMoisture Coconut and Hibiscus Conditioner stands head and shoulders above the rest. Its moisturizing prowess, captivating scent, and ability to bring out the best in curly hair make it a must-have addition to any beauty routine. Say hello to soft, manageable, and beautifully scented hair that turns heads wherever you go. Treat yourself – your hair deserves this indulgence!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product for curls
reviews.reviewText: My daughter has extremely curly hair and this has been a go to product for sometime. We did try a lot of competitors and this is the one that we always go back to. It keeps her dry hair moisturized and soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars First time trying this product
reviews.reviewText: So far it smells pretty…and it works for static hair…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was blown away by this conditioner! It was amazing!! Moisturizing yet gave me bouncy curls! Love it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very poor packaging; great product
reviews.reviewText: I gave this great product a 3 star because of its lousy packaging. My first use I dropped the bottle in the shower. Top of pump broke off! Also, the product is so rich and thick that that pump (before its fall) wouldn’t bring up the product.I won’t buy this conditioner again until it’s in a user friendly, usable container. I had to, over several days, bang the product out into a new container. At least now I can easily use itMy curly hair likes this product! Manufacturer, please change your packaging!
Me deja el cabello super suave y delicioso aroma

reviews.reviewTitle: If you have curly hair, buy this.
reviews.reviewText: I love Shea Moisture, and I wanted to try their conditioner out. As expected, phenomenal job by them. I usually have problems with frizz and poor shape on my curls, but this conditioner fixes everything. It also smells amazing. I would recommend this if you have curly hair and want a long lasting solution to texture.
Es el mejor que e probado lo recomiendo es súper suave
E' perfetto per i miei capelli ricci 2c-3a con bassa porosità. Li nutre in profondità e il profumo dura fino ad un paio di giorni!!
très bon produit pour les cheveux frisés !
